original_text:
Therefore because you trample on the poor
    and you exact taxes of grain from him,
you have built houses of hewn stone,
    but you shall not dwell in them;
you have planted pleasant vineyards,
    but you shall not drink their wine.
korean_text: 너희가 힘없는 자를 밟고 그에게서 밀의 부당한 세를 거두었은즉 너희가 비록 다듬은 돌로 집을 건축하였으나 거기 거주하지 못할 것이요 아름다운 포도원을 가꾸었으나 그 포도주를 마시지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore because you trample on the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희가 가난한 자를 짓밟기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and you exact taxes of grain from him,
you have built houses of hewn stone,
but you shall not dwell in them;
but you shall not drink their wine.
